rows.label: qst702407_msg0001
rows.name:
*Yaaaaawn* Guarding the warehouse
is such a snooze-fest...

rows.label: qst702407_msg0002
rows.name:
But I do like snoozing,
it has to be said. Yep, I
guess I've lucked out!

rows.label: qst702407_msg0003
rows.name:
Whaaa...? You know a job
that'd be perfect for me?

rows.label: qst702407_msg0004
rows.name:
Wow! Who knew the militia gave you
three meals AND naps a day, "except
and unless when stipulated otherwise"!

rows.label: qst702407_msg0005
rows.name:
...No, no way. Whatever the
world may think of me, I'm still
a gallant soldier of Iira!

rows.label: qst702407_msg0006
rows.name:
I don't care if I get to serve
directly under Adel-sama, I will
not abandon my duties so easily!

rows.label: qst702407_msg0007
rows.name:
...But then again, just
thinking about those
naps... Man, now I'm torn.

rows.label: qst702407_msg0008
rows.name:
I have to sleep on this, man. If I
decide to join up, I'll just head
on over to the militia camp, yeah?

rows.label: qst702407_msg0102
rows.name:
Do I join the militia and loaf
around...? Or do I just keep loafing
in front of this warehouse here...?

rows.label: qst702407_msg0103
rows.name:
Hm. When I say it like that, it
does kinda sound a bit like much
of a muchness, doesn't it?
